summary.para: A Carousel like in Bootstrap. It holds as items.
It can also display an overlay, control-arrows, item indicators and a play/stop button.
Index of the active item at the beginning.
Default is 0.
Type of swapping animation.
Default is FadeOut.
Waiting time before beginning swap animation in ms.
Default is 6000.
Starts interval after [AutoStartTime] ms, if interval not running and no action occurs.
Value of 0 deactivates autostart.
Default is 0.
Carousel Interval starts running or paused.
Default is true.
Next/Previous Arrows available
Default is true.
Indicators available
Default is true.
PlayButton available
Default is true.
Content of the .
This should be a list of objects.

member.name: P:NoJsBlazor.Carousel.Overlay
member.summary: Html that will be rendered in the overlay section.

summary.para: Fires every time after active item changed.
Parameter is index of the new active item.
Fires every time after the Running state is set.
Parameter indicates if the carousel is currently running.

member.summary: Indicates if the interval of the carousel is currently running.

member.name: P:NoJsBlazor.Carousel.AutoStartRunning
member.summary: Inidicates if the autoStart Timer is currently ticking.

member.name: M:NoJsBlazor.Carousel.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes Interval Timer and Autostart Timer.

summary.para: Finds the indexes of the 2 given CarouselItems and then executes .
If one of the items is not present in the CarouselItem list, an is thrown.
Swaps the 2 items in the CarouselItem list at the given indexes.

The active item is preserved.
e.g. 0 is active, swap(0, 1) -> 1 will be active, so the active item won't change.

member.name: M:NoJsBlazor.Carousel.StartInterval
member.summary: Starts the interval-timer that automatically change to next item.

member.name: M:NoJsBlazor.Carousel.StopInterval
member.summary: Stops the interval-timer, so the current item will not automatically change.

member.name: T:NoJsBlazor.CarouselAnimation
member.summary: Type of animation, how the items are swapped.

member.summary: Transition on opacity

member.summary: Transition on translate x-axis

member.summary: Transition on translate x-axis and rotate y-axis

member.name: T:NoJsBlazor.Slider`1
member.summary: An object that holds a ranged input together with a decrease and increase button and a label indicating the current value.

summary.para: Value of the Slider.
Should be used as two-way-binding.

Invokes every time Value get changed with:
LeftButton, RightButton, Slider or EditField.
This or can be used for two-way-binding.

Invokes every time Value get changed with:
LeftButton, RightButton, Slider (only on release) or EditField.
This or can be used for two-way-binding.
An optional label.
Default is
Slider lower bounds.
Default is 0.
Slider upper bounds.
Default is 10.
Slider precision.
Default is 1.
Enables or disables the controls (left-button, right-button, slider-thumb).
Default is true.
Indicates if the user is able to edit the number directly.
Technically the number is displayed in a input field instead of a label.
Dafault is false.
Content inside the left Button.
Default is a svg showing "ðŸ¡¸".
Content inside the right Button.
Default is a svg showing "ðŸ¡º".
The way the value should be printed.
Default is value.ToString().
Parsing function for the edit field.
It should get the content of the edit field as string and return the appropriated number. It should return null if the value is not valid.
Default try parses number and when succeed, clamps to Min,Max-bounds.

member.summary: y-coordinate

summary.para: Sets the coordinates x/y with ClientX/ClientY and returns those.
Normally called in onpointerdown event.
Sets the coordinates x/y with ClientX/ClientY and returns the difference to it's previous.
Normally called in onpointermove event.
